nodes.text: Chewie Goes to the Dentist is a comic printed in Star Wars Jedi Quest Kids Club 2.

Han Solo forces Chewbacca to get a tooth pulled, and enlists Watto, supposedly "the best dentist in the Outer Rim." Watto, assisted by pit droids, attempts to remove Chewbacca's bad tooth, while C-3PO reassures Chewbacca that it "won't hurt a bit." Chewbacca cries out in pain, destroying the dental chair and knocking Watto to the ground. Watto asks what happened, and Han explains that sometimes "it's best to let the Wookiee whine," to which Watto retorts that Chewbacca is an "ungrateful fur ball."
